short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: - Creates a Search Widget on an Upcoming Events Page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wizard's Yawning Portal offers monthly games in one long list. On a "Register for Games Below" page, this extension injects a search widget above the list to zero in on the games you want to play. Visit https://yawningportal.dnd.wizards.com/ , click on one of the "Register for Games" links, and the extension will provide search and filter capabilities above the game listings. Icon provided by Dungeon icons created by Smashicons - Flaticon
